articles.author: Rebecca Hersher
articles.title: 2024 will be the most active hurricane season in the Atlantic - NPR
articles.description: The National Hurricane Center is predicting the largest number of storms ever forecast for the Atlantic, putting tens of millions of Americans at risk.
articles.content: This years Atlantic hurricane season is expected to be extremely active, putting tens of millions of Americans in the eastern half of the country at risk from flooding and damaging winds, forecasters… [+4399 chars]
